The furious battle of Pearl Harbor became the first in the sequence of gory sea combats.

short_description: Penguins Arena is a thrilling and innovative First Penguin Shooter with quick, hectic rounds and where the magic of reincarnation, combined with the supernatural ability to return to the game as a ghost, ensures that your character has every chance to change your tribe's fate, even in the afterlife.

short_description: You awake to the sound of your own panicked breath. In Manhunt, you must run, hide and fight to survive. If you can stay alive long enough, you may find out who did this to you. This is a brutal blood sport.

short_description: Bully tells the story of mischievous 15-year-old Jimmy Hopkins as he goes through the hilarity and awkwardness of adolescence. Beat the jocks at dodge ball, play pranks on the preppies, save the nerds, kiss the girl and navigate the social hierarchy in the worst school around.

short_description: Niko Bellic, Johnny Klebitz and Luis Lopez all have one thing in common - they live in the worst city in America. Liberty City worships money and status, and is heaven for those who have them and a living nightmare for those who don't.

short_description: Bizarre Earthquake is a third-person point & click adventure game. The story is about a seismologist and her assistant who try to uncover the mysteries behind a bizarre earthquake they encounter.

title: Bacteria
tags: Single-player,Steam Achievements,Steam Trading Cards,Steam Cloud,Family Sharing
short_description: 'Bacteria' - A relaxing puzzle game based on the rules of the cellular automaton ‘Life’ devised by John Horton Conway in 1970.

title: Caravanserail
tags: Single-player,Family Sharing
short_description: Caravanserail is an arcade-ish trading game. Buy, set a price, and sell. It sounds simple but it'll take you some skill to set the right price according to the market tendencies...

title: Little Walker
tags: Single-player,Steam Achievements,Steam Trading Cards,Camera Comfort,Custom Volume Controls,Adjustable Difficulty,Keyboard Only Option,Partial Controller Support,Steam Cloud,Steam Leaderboards,Family Sharing
short_description: Journey your way high and low, far and wide, just for the heck of it. Meet weirdos along the way. Explode things. Explode them good. It's a super quirky semi-retro platform-adventure.

title: Overcooked
tags: Single-player,Multi-player,PvP,Shared/Split Screen PvP,Co-op,Shared/Split Screen Co-op,Shared/Split Screen,Steam Achievements,Full controller support,Steam Trading Cards,Steam Cloud,Remote Play on Phone,Remote Play on Tablet,Remote Play on TV,Remote Play Together,Family Sharing
short_description: Overcooked is a chaotic couch co-op cooking game for one to four players. Working as a team, you and your fellow chefs must prepare, cook and serve up a variety of tasty orders before the baying customers storm out in a huff.

title: Square's Route
tags: Single-player,Family Sharing
short_description: Square’s Route is the addictive new game of path finding and weed whacking.

title: Terror Lab
tags: Single-player,Family Sharing
short_description: You have just awoken without knowing who or where you are. You can't remember anything but it is clear you are not alone.

title: Minimal
tags: Single-player,Steam Achievements,Full controller support,Steam Trading Cards,Steam Cloud,Family Sharing
short_description: Unique logic game with simple controls and addictive gameplay. There is no story, no clutter - everything is simple, minimalistic. Whole game tries to keep you focused on one simple goal, which is solving current puzzle.

title: Mind Games
tags: Single-player,Steam Achievements,Steam Trading Cards,Family Sharing
short_description: Mind games is a great set of extremely hard brain twisting puzzles! Warning: this game is for smarties! Only one out of ten people can solve the first puzzle!

tags: Single-player,Steam Achievements,Partial Controller Support,Steam Cloud
short_description: Sophie and Mike have been separated by an evil group and must now try and rejoin forces before taking on a great evil. But something more sinister is happening and may change the world forever!

title: Dead End Road
tags: Single-player,Partial Controller Support,Family Sharing
short_description: Dead End Road is an atmospheric driving game, with a low-fi aesthetic and procedurally generated elements. Complete your journey to seek the assistance of the old witch at Dead End Road; Get there before daybreak and perhaps, just perhaps, you can escape this nightmare.

title: Draw Rider
tags: Single-player,Multi-player,Cross-Platform Multiplayer,Steam Trading Cards,Includes level editor,Family Sharing
short_description: Draw Rider - a classic racing game, made in 2D. Your goal is to get to the finish line within a certain time. In the game you will find a huge variety of levels, the passage of which will open various options for character customization.

title: Rebirth of Island
tags: Single-player,Steam Achievements,Full controller support,Steam Trading Cards,Commentary available,Family Sharing
short_description: Survive, adapt, and research in the New World, with its rules, dwellers, and their laws. Head the colonization of these locations and ensure the independence and security of your population.

title: Rabiez: Epidemic
tags: Single-player,Steam Achievements,Steam Trading Cards,Steam Cloud,Family Sharing
short_description: Real-time combat in the zombie apocalypse! Guide your survivors through hordes of the infected to escape the epicentre of infection!

title: Elements II: Hearts of Light
tags: Single-player,Steam Trading Cards,Partial Controller Support,Family Sharing
short_description: The highly-anticipated sequel to Elements: Soul of Fire, here at last! A mysterious little girl. An insidious plot to resurrect a great evil. The legend of a faint and fading hope. And a band of young heroes desperate for answers.

title: GEO Master
tags: Single-player,Multi-player,Cross-Platform Multiplayer,Family Sharing
short_description: GEO Master is a 3D geography game. This game has different learning modes. You have the opportunity to explore the globe, you can test your knowledge and then compare your score obtained during timed games on the whole planet or on the continent of your choice ! Learn, remember and enter friendly competitions !

title: Pinball HD Collection
tags: Single-player,Steam Leaderboards,Family Sharing
short_description: Pinball HD Collection - This game will change your idea of Pinball. Each table - Wild West, The Deep, Jungle Style, Pirates, Red Planet, Snow, Da Vinci, Arcade, Tanks, Halloween and others - are masterpieces. You'll be stunned with the level of realism.

title: Lionessy Story
tags: Single-player,Full controller support,Steam Trading Cards,Steam Cloud,Family Sharing
short_description: «Lionessy story» is a visual novel that tells a story of a lion cub living out his carefree days in a lion pride reigning over the great African savannah. But life in the wilderness is never easy, and after a terrible tragedy yanks him out of his pampered lifestyle, the young cub has to face the dangers of the real world where anything...
